enhanced_posts.text:
Drop 23 — EpsteinStickers.com

Trump’s hat says it all:
I’M ON THE LIST.
He was told this in May by his DOJ. So the coverup began.

Not a theory.
Not a joke.
A sitting U.S. president — named in the sealed Epstein records.

#EpsteinFiles #Trump #StickerDrop #TruthSticks #DOJ #RedHat #ImOnTheList

enhanced_posts.text:
#BlackTrumpSupporters

"message is clear: you can shuck, jive, & sell your own people down the river for #Trump; & he still won’t let you near levers of real authority.

So ask yourself:
What does it say that Black voices who defended Trump loudest were first ones locked out of his 2nd White House?"
